author: benh
msg: Removed debug message introduced in previous commit by mistake.

author: benh
msg: Made HADOOP_HOME configurable through Mesos config system, refactored
environment setup in isolation modules a little to remove duplicated
code, and fixed some bugs that were introduced in switching to the new
config framework (e.g. assuming that MESOS_HOME is above src, while
right now it actually is src).

author: benh
msg: Bug fix for external tests that are disabled: do not search for
the DISABLED_ prefix when looking for the test's script

author: benh
msg: Fixed a bug in configurator - initializing from argc/argv could change
argv[0] on some platforms because dirname() is allowed to modify its
